title: 2013 PLFA season
text:
The 2013 <a href="season%20%28sports%29">season</a> of the <a href="Polish%20American%20Football%20League">Polish American Football League</a> was the eighth season played by the <a href="american%20football">american football</a> leagues in <a href="Poland">Poland</a>.
Regular season of the Topliga took place between March 23 and June 23, 2013. The Polish champion was determined in the play-off final - the VIII SuperFinal PLFA (known as the Polish Bowl VIII). The <a href="Giants%20Wroc%C5%82aw">Giants Wrocław</a> beat the <a href="Warsaw%20Eagles">Warsaw Eagles</a> in the championship game 29–13 hosted at the <a href="National%20Stadium%2C%20Warsaw">National Stadium</a> in <a href="Warsaw">Warsaw</a>.
